text: Rab farmātā hai, “Ai Yāqūb mere ḳhādim, ḳhauf na khā, kyoṅki maiṅ tere sāth hūṅ. Maiṅ un tamām qaumoṅ ko nest-o-nābūd kar dūṅgā jin meṅ maiṅ ne tujhe muntashir kar diyā hai, lekin tujhe maiṅ is tarah safhā-e-hastī se nahīṅ miṭāūṅgā. Albattā maiṅ munāsib had tak terī tambīh karūṅga, kyoṅki maiṅ tujhe sazā die baġhair nahīṅ chhoṛ saktā.”
